item.description:
Happy Fall, everyone!

Route 9 Ruby is meeting on Wednesday, October 17th at Punchbowl.com's office in Framingham, starting at 5:30pm. Come join your fellow Massachusetts rubyists to learn more about some great Ruby tech, talk about how to better our craft, enjoy some free food and beer, and meet a few new people.

This month's we're trying something new again:

Â 

Mini Hello Worlds

Our presenters will offer up 4-6 super-short presentations, such as a one-slide features/benefits summary followed by a quick tutorial on how to get your first, ever-so-simple app running with that tech.

Any Ruby-related tech could be a good candidate. I'll announce all the topics here once the schedule is filled to capacity.

** if you'd like to give one of these talks, please send me an email: darren.torpey@gmail.com **
item.name: October Route 9 Ruby: Mini Hello Worlds
